creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: square cloth made of two pieces sewn together. Both pieces are double cloth. Larger piece has a subtle pattern of rodent sitting up and cat head in two shades of tan. Smaller piece has pattern of birds in diamonds in tan and brown. Several holes.
object_name: Square Cloth with Birds, Rodents, and Felines
title: Square Cloth with Birds, Rodents, and Felines
